item.title: Logitech K810 Reset
item.description: I have been using the same external keyboard for my last three Macs, an excellent little Bluetooth keyboard from Logitech called the Logitech K810. It’s meant to be a keyboard for a Windows machine, but it works perfectly well for my Mac as well as my various iDevices. This morning when I came in to start working for the day, I found the keyboard had lost its mind! None of the keys worked properly.
